properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 10 at 10:27PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
With the recent full moon, water levels are expected to drop to
around -1 foot MLLW during low tide early Tue morning. The threat
will occur between 2 am and 4 am, with low tide occurring around
230 am EST. For a Low Water Advisory, levels have to drop to less
than or equal to -2.00 ft MLLW.

Mariners should use extra caution while navigating close to shore
and thru area inlets, watching out for exposed sandbars and
shoaling. And it's best to remain in the channel when navigating
along the IntraCoastal Waterway. Depthfinders, a strong Spot Light
and slow going are advised if navigating across the area waters
tonight.

NWSheadline: Early Tue Low Tide Water Levels to Reach -1.00 ft MLLW
